name: Feeling (Kylamber)
description:
A role playing game following a traveling psychologist that helps others on their manifestation of feelings.

Made using Godot Engine 3.8.1

CONTROLS

  • W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to move                                                                                                          
  • RIGHT CLICK on the screen to attack (When inside patient only)                                   
  • SPACE to interact

CREDITS

  • https://harvey656.itch.io/ for the sound effects;
  • https://kronbits.itch.io for the sound effects;
  • https://creapracticus.itch.io/ for the music;
  • https://vgcomposer.itch.io/ for the music;

 SOURCE CODE

  • https://github.com/Sklizter/feeling_game
